code: import React from'react';import card1 from'../assets/card1.jpg';import card2 from'../assets/card2.jpg';import card3 from'../assets/card3.jpg';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Cards=()=>{const cardsData=[{id:1,title:"Card 1",description:"This is the description for card 1",image:card1},{id:2,title:"Card 2",description:"This is the description for card 2",image:card2},{id:3,title:"Card 3",description:"This is the description for card 3",image:card3}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{className:"cards-section",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Our Services"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"cards-container",children:cardsData.map(card=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:card.image,alt:card.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:card.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:card.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"see-more-btn",children:"See More"})]},card.id))})]});};export default Cards;
